title: LP in Ranked not calculating properly
body: so i was sitting on 98lp in my league i only just started playing ranked again and **after one loss i got -17lp and went t 64lp what?** can someone please explain this  to me???

replies.body:
Hey there,

From looking at your match history it seems as though you've had quite a few losses within the past couple of days. (And one leave).

Are you sure you simply didn't forget a game that you lost, or even the leave?
If you genuinely believe something occurred that shouldn't have, I would recommend [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support so they can look into the issue further.
